short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: THIS EXTENSION IS FOR BETA TESTING. Extract job data from LinkedIn job postings and send it to Google Sheets.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Job Catcher App: Unlock Job Insights Effortlessly!

The Job Catcher App is a powerful Chrome extension designed to help professionals extract detailed job posting information from LinkedIn with just a click. Whether you’re job hunting, tracking market trends, or collecting competitive analysis data, Job Catcher simplifies the process by sending job details directly to your Google Sheets, saving you time and effort.

What Does Job Catcher Do?

Job Catcher allows users to:

	1.	Effortlessly Extract Job Data: As you browse job postings on LinkedIn, the app provides a button on each job posting page that, when clicked, extracts key job data. This includes details like the company name, job title, salary range, location, job type, total applicants, and required skills.
	2.	Send Data Directly to Google Sheets: Once the job data is extracted, the app automatically sends this information to a designated Google Sheet in real-time. This allows you to compile multiple job listings into one organized spreadsheet, perfect for tracking, comparisons, or further analysis.
	3.	Automate Your Job Search: By automating the data extraction process, Job Catcher eliminates the need for manual copying and pasting of information from job listings. Whether you are applying for jobs or conducting research, the app allows you to gather information efficiently without repetitive tasks.
	4.	Customizable for Your Needs: The extracted job data is sent to a Google Sheet you specify, giving you full control over where the information is stored and how it’s organized. Additionally, if headers or columns are missing in your sheet, Job Catcher will update the sheet to include the necessary fields automatically.
	5.	Real-time Tracking: No need to wait or refresh. Job Catcher integrates seamlessly into your workflow. As you navigate LinkedIn, the “CATCH JOB!” button appears on each job posting, allowing you to extract job information whenever you need it.

Why Should You Install Job Catcher?

	1.	Save Time and Boost Productivity: Whether you’re a job seeker, recruiter, or industry researcher, Job Catcher automates a tedious process. Instead of manually collecting job information, you can click a button and instantly log all the details into your spreadsheet.
	2.	Organize Your Job Hunt: Keep track of all the job postings you’re interested in, complete with critical information like salary, job description, and required skills. Having all this information in one place makes it easier to compare opportunities and plan your next steps.
	3.	Research and Competitive Insights: For HR professionals and market researchers, Job Catcher is a great way to gather industry data. You can analyze trends in job postings, compare different company offers, and even track the number of applicants for various roles—all from a single Google Sheet.
	4.	Easy to Use: No complex setup is needed. Once installed, the app is ready to work with any LinkedIn job post. Just click the button, and you’re done.
	5.	Free and Secure: Job Catcher is a free tool that respects your privacy. All interactions with Google Sheets and LinkedIn are done securely, and no personal data is stored or shared by the extension.

Who Is It For?

	•	Job Seekers: Manage your job applications, compare roles, and track potential opportunities without missing key details.
	•	Recruiters: Collect market data on job trends, salaries, and hiring needs.
	•	Industry Analysts: Monitor hiring patterns, track skills in demand, and gather data for competitive analysis.

In a fast-moving job market, Job Catcher gives you a simple, powerful tool to streamline your job search or data collection process. Install the Job Catcher app and take control of your job insights today!
